item.description:
Â 

This class is suitable for beginners and all levels. We will practice gentle yoga to bring us into the present moment, stretch and distress. Yoga will be followed by a guided meditation practice for deeper awareness and relaxation.

Class is 1 hour. Cost is $8 payable at class. Please bring a yoga mat and meditation cushion if you have one. Wear loose comfortable clothing.
item.how_to_find_us: Use entrance on Palamino Drive NOTE: Unit #63

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Mindfulness Yoga & Guided Meditation
